// <auto-generated/>
using System;
using System.Buffers.Binary;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;
using System.Text;
using FourSer.Contracts;
using System.IO;
using FourSer.Gen.Helpers;

namespace FourSer.Tests.GeneratorTestCases.CollectionUShortCount;

public partial class UShortCountTest : ISerializable<UShortCountTest>
{
    public static int GetPacketSize(UShortCountTest obj)
    {
        var size = 0;
        size += sizeof(ushort); // Count size for Cats
        foreach(var item in obj.Cats)
        {
            size += Cat.GetPacketSize(item);
        }
        return size;
    }

    private UShortCountTest(System.Collections.Generic.List<FourSer.Tests.GeneratorTestCases.CollectionUShortCount.Cat> cats)
    {
        this.Cats = cats;
    }

    public UShortCountTest()
    {
        this.Cats = default;
    }

    public static UShortCountTest Deserialize(ref System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> buffer)
    {
        var catsCount = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.RoSpanReaderHelpers.ReadUInt16(ref buffer);
        var cats = new System.Collections.Generic.List<FourSer.Tests.GeneratorTestCases.CollectionUShortCount.Cat>(catsCount);
        for (int i = 0; i < catsCount; i++)
        {
            cats.Add(Cat.Deserialize(ref buffer));
        }
        var obj = new UShortCountTest(cats);
        return obj;
    }

    public static UShortCountTest Deserialize(System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> buffer)
    {
        return Deserialize(ref buffer);
    }

    public static UShortCountTest Deserialize(System.IO.Stream stream)
    {
        var catsCount = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.StreamReaderHelpers.ReadUInt16(stream);
        var cats = new System.Collections.Generic.List<FourSer.Tests.GeneratorTestCases.CollectionUShortCount.Cat>(catsCount);
        for (int i = 0; i < catsCount; i++)
        {
            cats.Add(Cat.Deserialize(stream));
        }
        var obj = new UShortCountTest(cats);
        return obj;
    }

    public static int Serialize(UShortCountTest obj, System.Span<byte> data)
    {
        var originalData = data;
        if (obj.Cats is null)
        {
            FourSer.Gen.Helpers.SpanWriterHelpers.WriteUInt16(ref data, (ushort)0);
        }
        else
        {
            FourSer.Gen.Helpers.SpanWriterHelpers.WriteUInt16(ref data, (ushort)obj.Cats.Count);
            for (int i = 0; i < obj.Cats.Count; i++)
            {
            var bytesWritten = Cat.Serialize(obj.Cats[i], data);
            data = data.Slice(bytesWritten);
            }
        }
        return originalData.Length - data.Length;
    }

    public static int Serialize(UShortCountTest obj, System.IO.Stream stream)
    {
        var initialPosition = stream.Position;
        if (obj.Cats is null)
        {
            FourSer.Gen.Helpers.StreamWriterHelpers.WriteUInt16(stream, (ushort)0);
        }
        else
        {
            FourSer.Gen.Helpers.StreamWriterHelpers.WriteUInt16(stream, (ushort)obj.Cats.Count);
            for (int i = 0; i < obj.Cats.Count; i++)
            {
            Cat.Serialize(obj.Cats[i], stream);
            }
        }
        return (int)(stream.Position - initialPosition);
    }
}


// <auto-generated/>
using System;
using System.Buffers.Binary;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;
using System.Text;
using FourSer.Contracts;
using System.IO;
using FourSer.Gen.Helpers;

namespace FourSer.Tests.GeneratorTestCases.CollectionUShortCount;

public partial class Cat : ISerializable<Cat>
{
    public static int GetPacketSize(Cat obj)
    {
        var size = 0;
        size += sizeof(int); // Size for unmanaged type Id
        size += StringEx.MeasureSize(obj.Name); // Size for string Name
        return size;
    }

    private Cat(int id, string name)
    {
        this.Id = id;
        this.Name = name;
    }

    public Cat()
    {
        this.Id = default;
        this.Name = default;
    }

    public static Cat Deserialize(ref System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> buffer)
    {
        var id = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.RoSpanReaderHelpers.ReadInt32(ref buffer);
        var name = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.RoSpanReaderHelpers.ReadString(ref buffer);
        var obj = new Cat(id, name);
        return obj;
    }

    public static Cat Deserialize(System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> buffer)
    {
        return Deserialize(ref buffer);
    }

    public static Cat Deserialize(System.IO.Stream stream)
    {
        var id = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.StreamReaderHelpers.ReadInt32(stream);
        var name = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.StreamReaderHelpers.ReadString(stream);
        var obj = new Cat(id, name);
        return obj;
    }

    public static int Serialize(Cat obj, System.Span<byte> data)
    {
        var originalData = data;
        FourSer.Gen.Helpers.SpanWriterHelpers.WriteInt32(ref data, (Int32)obj.Id);
        FourSer.Gen.Helpers.SpanWriterHelpers.WriteString(ref data, obj.Name);
        return originalData.Length - data.Length;
    }

    public static int Serialize(Cat obj, System.IO.Stream stream)
    {
        var initialPosition = stream.Position;
        FourSer.Gen.Helpers.StreamWriterHelpers.WriteInt32(stream, (Int32)obj.Id);
        FourSer.Gen.Helpers.StreamWriterHelpers.WriteString(stream, obj.Name);
        return (int)(stream.Position - initialPosition);
    }
}
